Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: raat kee qasam jab (sooraj ko) chhipa le
aur din kee qasam jab khoob raushan ho
aur us (zaat) kee jisane nar va maada ko paida kiya
ki beshak tumhaaree koshish tarah tarah kee hai
to jisane sakhaavat kee aur achchhee baat (islaam) kee tasdeeq kee
to ham usake lie raahat va aasaanee
(jannat) ke asabaab muhayya kar denge
aur jisane bukhl kiya, aur beparavaee kee
aur achchhee baat ko jhuthalaaya
to ham use sakhtee (jahannum) mein pahuncha denge
aur jab vah halaak hoga to usaka maal usake kuchh bhee kaam na aaega
hamen raah dikha dena zaroor hai
aur aakherat aur duniya (donon) khaas hamaaree cheeze hain
to hamane tumhen bhadakatee huee aag se dara diya
usamen bas vahee daakhil hoga jo bada badabakht hai
jisane jhuthalaaya aur munh pher liya aur jo bada parahezagaar hai
vah usase bacha liya jaega
jo apana maal (khuda kee raah) mein deta hai taaki paak ho jae
aur lutph ye hai ki kisee ka us par koee ehasaan nahin jisaka use badala diya jaata hai
balki (vah to) sirph apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar kee khushanoodee haasil karane ke lie (deta hai)
aur vah anaqareeb bhee khush ho jaega
